component.name: LabelListFocusFontExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/rsgde_bg_hd.jpg"
example = m.top.findNode("exampleLabelList")
examplerect = example.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - examplerect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - examplerect.height) / 2 example.translation = [ centerx, centery ]
example.font = "font:MediumSystemFont" example.focusedFont = "font:MediumSystemFont" example.focusedFont.size = example.font.size+5
m.top.setFocus(true) end sub
